overview: Movie cut of the series.  Ai studied abroad until, after being expelled for quarreling, his father forces him to return to Thailand where he attends classes at the university where he teaches. There, Ai meets Chen Nhai, his new Harley Davidson-riding classmate who has an obsession with a yellow duck keychain. Ai falls in love at first sight and a whirlwind romance ensues.
title: Ai Long Nhai: The Endless Love
